tool_description: A tool that generates personalized greetings based on user input.

api_list.name: Get Greet
api_list.description: Fetch a personalized greeting for a specified name and cringe level.

required_parameters.name: name
required_parameters.description: The name for which the greeting is generated.

required_parameters.name: cringeLevel
required_parameters.description: The level of cringe for the greeting, ranging from 1 to 10.
